nodes.text: The Jedi Dreamer was the custom-built starship of Korren Starchaser, a veteran NRSS scout.

The Jedi Dreamer was a custom designed Scout vessel. It was built out of sturdy alloys to protect it, and had an aerodynamic design for smooth flight in atmosphere. It was equipped with a powerful sensor package.
The ship was used on a scouting mission to the Serianan system.
Korren Starchaser commanded the ship, and Mowa Gundeeb was the second in command. Senni Otek worked as a tech who kept the ship running.
